name: Manor Of Horrors
description:
Welcome to Manor Of Horrors!

The protagonist finds themselves in a dream, surrounded by spirits. In order to wake up, they must defeat the ghosts.  Besides the protagonist, there are standard ghosts and more demonic ghosts that function as bosses.

The rules are simple. Use WASD to move around. Press Space to shoot at your opponents. 

The Goal is to defeat all of the ghosts. When you defeat the ghosts, you receive trophies as a prize. Ghosts will be chasing you and shooting at you. Every time you get hit by a ghost projectile, you lose a life. You have to survive 5 waves to get to the boss battle. Good Luck!

A spooky game that’s sure to give you goosebumps…

 

Made by The Spookies.

Our game was inspired by the Ghostbusters.
